name: Forest In Th House (Black Version)
description:
Very intricate signed artist's book, laser cut from Ursus 300 gsm acid free black card. Looks beautiful when displayed with backlighting.

Each page measures 16 cm wide and 15 cm high. Fully extended the book is approximately 160 cm including covers.

A doorway is cut in the front cover which introduces you to the visual 'story' of a simple house structure being gradually obliterated by the forest growing within it.

The book is presented in an origami folded envelope made from Fabriano Ingres paper with a digitally printed front. The envelope measures 19 x 19 cm.

Please be aware, the laser cutter uses fire to 'cut' the paper and therefore all the edges have an attractive toasted appearance.

Shipping within the UK is free. For shipping outside the UK please contact me first to arrange.

name: Golden Plover Nest
description:
Map fold booklet featuring moor grass on the cover which opens to reveal the beautiful, secret nest of a Golden Plover.

Part of a series of artworks called The Enfolding Landscape Revealed, looking at the hidden, the obscure and the overlooked within the natural environment.

Folded dimensions 14 cm x 14 cm. 

Reproduced from the original woodcuts. Printed with Epson UltraChrome ink on smooth matte paper, with a yellow/green jute twine closure.

For shipping outside the UK please contact me to arrange.

name: Furled
description:
For that very special person in your life...

Opens to reveal image of twigs with buds and the text 'You are furled in my heart like a leaf within its bud'.

Map-fold booklet with matte white cover and inner. Comes in a translucent origami pocket.

Pocket dimensions 14 cm x 14 cm, booklet 13 cm x 13 cm.

Printed with Epson UltraChrome ink on acid free card.

For shipping outside the UK please contact me to arrange.

name: A Walk Around The Reservoir In March
description:
Artist's Book in a signed edition of 35.

Concertina book with 10 pages, printed with Epson UltraChrome ink on Bockingford watercolour paper with archival manila covers. The book has  a russet coloured jute twine closure.

Cover dimensions  16 cm x 11 cm.
Fully extended length 160 cm.

The poem reads:
Winding of Winter 
quickening of green
what is to come 
and what has been.

For shipping outside the UK please contact me to arrange.

name: Winter Calligraphy
description:
Artist's Book in a signed edition of 35.

Concertina book with 10 pages printed with Epson UltraChrome ink on Japanese Hosho paper with Bockingford watercolour paper covers. The book has a black jute twine closure.

Cover dimensions 11.5 x 11.5 cm. Fully extended length is 115 cm.

Content is 9 images of snow scoured fields with contrasting dark walls and trees in the landscape above the South Pennine town of Hebden Bridge. From original images drawn in charcoal on rough paper.

Postage within the UK is included in the price.

For shipping outside the UK please contact me to arrange prior to ordering.

name: Mallard - Folding Paper Skull
description:
Folding paper sculpture of a duck skull, reproduced from the original drawing of the actual skull found on a country walk.

Dimensions when folded 25 x 10.5 cm.

Printed with Epson UltraChrome ink on archival matte paper.
Cover acid free black card.

For shipping outside the UK please contact me to arrange.

name: Godwit - Folding Paper Skull
description:
Folding paper sculpture of a Bar-tailed Godwit skull, reproduced from the original drawing of the actual skull found on a seaside walk.

Dimensions when folded 25 x 10.5 cm.

Printed with Epson UltraChrome ink on archival matte paper. Cover is made from acid free black card.

For shipping outside the UK please contact me to arrange.
